metadata.title: USN-4846-1 -- Yubico PIV Tool vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that libykpiv, a supporting library of the Yubico PIV tool and YubiKey PIV Manager, mishandled specially crafted input. An attacker with a custom-made, malicious USB device could potentially execute arbitrary code on a computer running the Yubico PIV Tool or Yubikey PIV Manager.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4846-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libykpiv1 - 1.0.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
